__CORE__.css: /* CHROME 63 MEGA-PATCH */ /* 1. FLEXBOX GAP POLYFILL (The Owl) */ .gap-1 > * + *, .gap-x-1 > * + * { margin-left: 0.25rem; } .gap-2 > * + *, .gap-x-2 > * + * { margin-left: 0.5rem; } .gap-4 > * + *, .gap-x-4 > * + * { margin-left: 1rem; } .flex-col > * + * { margin-left: 0 !important; margin-top: 0.5rem; } /* 2. MODERN LAYOUT FIXES */ img, video, svg { max-width: 100% !important; height: auto !important; flex-shrink: 1 !important; } .flex > * { min-width: 0 !important; } .inset-0 { top: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0; left: 0; } /* 3. VISUALS */ :focus, :focus-visible { outline: 4px solid #FFD700 !important; z-index: 99999; } .backdrop-blur { backdrop-filter: none !important; background: rgba(20,20,20,0.95) !important; } ::-webkit-scrollbar { display: none; }
__CORE__.js: /* --- CHROMIUM 63 JS RUNTIME UPGRADE --- */ (function(){ /* 1. globalThis Polyfill */ if(typeof globalThis==='undefined') window.globalThis=window; /* 2. String.replaceAll Polyfill */ if(!String.prototype.replaceAll){ String.prototype.replaceAll=function(str, newStr){ if(Object.prototype.toString.call(str).toLowerCase() === '[object regexp]') return this.replace(str, newStr); return this.replace(new RegExp(str.replace(/[.*+?^${}()|[\]\\]/g, '\\$&'), 'g'), newStr); }; } /* 3. Array.flat Polyfill */ if(!Array.prototype.flat){ Array.prototype.flat=function(depth){ var flattend=[]; (function flat(array, depth){ for(var i=0; i<array.length; i++){ if(Array.isArray(array[i]) && depth>0) flat(array[i], depth-1); else flattend.push(array[i]); } })(this, Math.floor(depth)||1); return flattend; }; } /* 4. Object.fromEntries Polyfill */ if(!Object.fromEntries){ Object.fromEntries=function(entries){ if(!entries||!entries[Symbol.iterator]) throw new Error('Object.fromEntries() requires a single iterable argument'); let obj={}; for(let [key, value] of entries) obj[key]=value; return obj; }; } /* 5. ResizeObserver Stub (Prevents Crashes) */ if(typeof ResizeObserver==='undefined'){ window.ResizeObserver=class{ observe(){} unobserve(){} disconnect(){} }; } /* 6. SYSTEM UTILS */ window.TizenUtils={ keepAwake:()=>{ const v=document.createElement('video'); v.src='https://raw.githubusercontent.com/anthonium/Gestures/master/blank.mp4'; v.loop=true; v.play().catch(()=>{}); document.body.appendChild(v); } }; window.TizenUtils.keepAwake(); setInterval(()=>{ const a=document.activeElement; if(!a||a===document.body){ const t=document.querySelector('.card, .item, button, input, [tabindex="0"]'); if(t)t.focus(); } }, 2000); })();
